Traits.Name: Defiance
Traits.Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect.

Traits.Name: Vigilance
Traits.Description: Foes can’t dash in your engagement and can’t move through your space.

Interrupts.Name: Guardian
Interrupts.Description: When an ally you can see in range 3 is targeted by an attack, you can dash up to 2 spaces towards that ally. Then, if you’re adjacent, you can change the target of the attack to you.

Actions.Name: Head Crack
Actions.Description: Deal fray physical damage to an adjacent foe. They must save or be dazed. If a foe is already dazed, increase damage to light.

Actions.Name: Great Fortify
Actions.Description: Reduce max speed to 0, but gain cover and sturdy, and apply to all allies while adjacent. Ends at the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Great Bash
Actions.Description: Dash forward up to 3 spaces, then an adjacent foe must save or take light physical damage and be shoved 3 spaces.

Actions.Name: Blackheart
Actions.Effect: Gains +1 boon and true strike if character is stunned, dazed, or winded.
